snippet: The Texan singer-songwriter Nanci Griffith's new album, "Intersection," will be released in the United States in April but is already out in Ireland and the United Kingdom, where she has performed every year since 1986. The new songs address themes...
abstract: The Texan singer-songwriter Nanci Griffith's new album, "Intersection," will be released in the United States in April but is already out in Ireland and the United Kingdom, where she has performed every year since 1986. The new songs address themes like the economic doldrums and religious and racial tensions.

headline.main: Nanci Griffith, a Texan in Ireland, Singing Her Politics
